lender.name: Colton

lender.occupational_info: I work in a pharmacy, I sell medications to people who need them.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I received a lot of loans, scholarships and grants in order to be able to live my life growing up, and now I want to do the same for others.

lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital; supporting clinical staff as they use computers and imaging equipment to perform diagnostic tests on patients.

lender.name: Steven and Emily
lender.loan_because: we hope to make a difference and bring some hope and joy to another less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I design and implement network environments for companies

lender.name: Livia
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone become self-sufficient and able to help provide for their families. If I'm able to help why not? Why not give someone a chance?
lender.occupational_info: At the moment trying to begin a teaching career in high school art.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share

lender.name: David

lender.occupational_info: I teach Accounting classes at the University

lender.name: St. Louis Ethical Society Youth
lender.loan_because: We are members of the world community, which depends on the cooperation of all people for peace and justice.
lender.occupational_info: The Ethical Society is a diverse, ethics-centered community of caring people dedicated to deed before creed. We strive to bring out the best in the human spirit, appreciate the uniqueness and worth of every person, treat all with dignity and respect, cultivate a community of people who support each other through the stages of life, raise the quality of all our relationships, act with reverence and commitment toward the natural world, and work to create a more just, loving and sustainable world for all.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a University to raise funds for economic research.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed to be able to help others.

lender.name: Doug

lender.occupational_info: Just an ordinary bloke.

lender.name: Takashi

lender.name: Ryan

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It's something small that I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I love being a grandma. Grandmother's do the same work everywhere.

lender.name: maggie
lender.loan_because: it's not a big risk for me, but it could make a real difference to someone else ... i also like the idea of helping someone on the other side of the world who is struggling ... the optimist in me finds this very heartening!
lender.occupational_info: i take care of my kids and am starting to work again after some time off ... i do some graphic design, some website design, some helping people get their computers set up & working properly ...

lender.occupational_info: I watch sports games and write down everything interesting that happens.

lender.occupational_info: with my company http://www.nobla.nu we help brands being useful through marketing and advertising: creativity for the sake of good

lender.loan_because: This was initially a memorial gift for a loved one who passed on. Thanks Steve!

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: it's necessary for many
lender.occupational_info: i'm studying forestry

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: this is one step closer to making a more peaceful world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach secondary school science.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Each of us deserves the opportunity to succeed, and we can only do so by helping each other.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a volunteer for 25 years, sometimes on a full time basis. Each and every project brings joy, whether it's to conserve wildlife habitat, or to bring people together who can share philanthropy ideas and reach their goals, or to share funding with others. My life is blessed to be able to make a positive difference in the world by helping others.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I think people who are lucky enough to have plenty should give an opportunity to others to have the same.

lender.name: Damart
lender.loan_because: We like to help enterprising people and we want that the initiatives of the people can be realized

lender.name: Marja
lender.loan_because: I travel a lot and see thing you wish you can change, with Kiva I can help a little.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help... and collectively we can make a difference to someone's life.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: Tele
lender.occupation: Wife, Mom, Massage Therapist & Hospice Volunteer
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that this program allows me to reach out to individuals in need and make a tangible difference in their lives. What a wonderful gift for the GIver as well as the Receiver!
lender.occupational_info: I have been fortunate in my life to have the love and support of my family. I have six wonderful children and a loving husband to count among my blessings.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: traveller

lender.name: HAROLDO
lender.occupation: Student of Administration. University of Amazônia
lender.loan_because: Because I want to have my business, i am student of administration, and i will graduet in 2009. Now I live in Amazônia, Belém-Pará, we have prodoctos of quality made to export for all over the world
lender.occupational_info: Doce da Amazonia’s candies provide you with enchantment and mystery in its composition. Thus, we wish the Amazonian enchantments to bring love and happiness to your life.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I come from a family of hard workers. There have been many people who have helped and encouraged our small buisness along the way. We work hard for somethng that is our own and encourage others to do so with the same amount of pride.
lender.occupational_info: We operate mobile food stands from which we sell Italian sausage, hamburgers, hot dogs and french fries. We move from one location to another following large crowds that attend festivals and outdoor events. We also operate at a local market where people come to find inexpensive goods such as clothing, shoes, cleaning supplies and vegetables. We work outdoors cooking in the hot summers and cold winters. Good luck with your buisness.

lender.name: Ruphus
lender.loan_because: I was born in Africa and want to support small business in Africa.

lender.name: josie adam ryan
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are very fortunate enough to be able to. It is a wonderful feeling to know that you are helping someone live a better life.

lender.name: Stacylee
lender.loan_because: It allows for an individual's growth as a person and active member of society. It ultimately impacts society and the self esteem of the individual who receives the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money from university graduates for programs and projects that their university is administering.

lender.name: Hillary
lender.loan_because: it is so inspiring to help empower a person that is working to provide for their family and improve their quality of life in their own community!
lender.occupational_info: Advertising sales

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: A small sacrifice for me means the world to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work with data concerning sales for a large greeting card company, and turn that information into charts and graphs for management.

lender.name: Joana
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe that things can be better if we help one another. As anonymous citizens, other than dreaming about big actions that will never be taken, we can do smaller actions but with a greater and quicker result and hopefully change a little part of our world. :)

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It helps the world
lender.occupational_info: Helping people get a job

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: All over the globe people have good ideas and need the tools to make their lives and others better. No matter what your means in the developed world we together can help to do our part to assist building the developing world and providing sound solutions to challenges in the foundations of these developing areas.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the finance industry in the United States of America.

lender.name: Robert/April
lender.loan_because: to help others become business owners. There are so many others that could make a difference in the world they just don't have the means to do so. If I can help a little, someone else can have a better life
lender.occupational_info: working with non-profit companies and educators to help them become better equiped to meet there retirement needs. Provide them the knowledge to be able support themselves after retirement

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Luke 6:30
lender.occupational_info: I make computers do that thing they do.

lender.name: Claudio
lender.loan_because: I loan because of the Robin's theory: Everything you give comes back to you seven times, even if it's not money!

lender.name: Julie and Jon
lender.loan_because: I would want someone else to give me the same opportunity.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: because I believe in the act of sharing and I want to impact the world is a positive way and this is one small step

lender.name: Arman
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need of improving their lives, and those of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 19 year old game design student at a high school in a small town in Sweden.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It is great to be able to make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do for the less fortunate, even if it is only dollars a day.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company prepare and maintain a responsible financial plan by forecasting, implementing, and enforcing budgets.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I don't want to give people handouts. I'm confident that this website is reliable and I want to help people succeed in improving their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a television station that is funded by viewers!

lender.name: Cipeo
lender.loan_because: I fee that the world can't change without someone taking a step, and this is my step.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies who send and receive products through my companies railroad, with questions and problems. Also I work in a elementary school after school is over to help students with school work, fitness, meals, and positive support for issues in their lives that they might not get at home.

lender.name: The Berger Family
lender.loan_because: Great way to feel connected to helping create a positive change in our world.
lender.occupational_info: My wife is an attorney and I work in sales for a Coffee company based in Waterbury, VT.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I process paperwork that help people qualify to buy a home.

lender.name: Haroo Family
lender.loan_because: because we can and because we care
lender.occupational_info: we are a small group of friends, in high school, trying to make a difference in impoverished regions of the world.

lender.name: Robin & Archie
lender.loan_because: Because we feel it is the right thing to do. Everyone needs hope, needs to know someone is out there who cares.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to share some of the wonderful gifts that God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, wife and grandmother. I am retired but active in my church and community

lender.name: Dom
lender.loan_because: I admire true entrepreneurial spirit, wherever it comes from.
lender.occupational_info: I've been in the media business for sixteen years and have worked on a variety of magazines and websites in the UK, US and throughout Europe. I'm now working on a startup web development business in the green space.

lender.name: shawn
lender.loan_because: I love helping those in need
lender.occupational_info: Manage design & construction of large building projects

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: My uncle gave me a gift certificate and it makes me feel good to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. I play hockey and the sax. I like to read.

lender.name: HARRY
lender.loan_because: Giving back make me feel good
lender.occupational_info: I teach because I love educating folks about what they don't know

lender.occupational_info: Justin manages water resources Michelle helps spread the gospel of Christ

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs little help getting where they're going.
lender.occupational_info: Doctor

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I loan becasue I can.
lender.occupational_info: Significant

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I have the money and don't use it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are having trouble with computers. Some tools are extensions of your hand, for example the hammer, the cup, and the plow. Other tools are extensions of your mind, computers. I fix when them when they are not working as they should be.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to, and I'm glad that I can.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to make the world a better and more peacable place for all people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in middle school. I study math, language, science, social studies, music, health, and art.

lender.name: Libby and Katherine
lender.loan_because: Our parents want us to know how good it feels to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We go to school, go to dance class, and play with our friends.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I know that every person has the ability to make a difference in someone else's life and if I don't help who will? I am a member of Soroptimist International whose focus is on helping women and girls, and Kiva gives me the chance to help other women who really want to make a difference in their own life and in the lives of their families as well.
lender.occupational_info: I cash paychecks, make deposits into accounts, and count money.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: That is what Christ calls all people to do. Help others in need and to give all you have.
lender.occupational_info: I get my clients media coverage. My job is to ensure their company gets noticed and to increase their profits.

lender.name: Shelby & Zack
lender.loan_because: In our past we were each involved in international development work (Shelby in India; Zack in Armenia). Even though we are settled down in the U.S., it's fun to continue in a small way to lend opportunities to others.
lender.occupational_info: Shelby does research to analyze local community issues and evaluate programs so that people in the community can make good decisions about what issues to focus on and what to do about them. Zack is a poet and translator, and also works and studies in the health field.

lender.name: Doug and Jenn
lender.loan_because: it is great to help people across the world.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Terence
lender.loan_because: Although I don't make much money, I know I should be putting it to better use than eating out everyday and buying useless things.
lender.occupational_info: I play music, and a lot of hard work goes into it without any guarantee of monetary reward. I wouldn't say fame or fortune are my sole intentions for being a musician, but I understand the dream of being successful at whatever it is you want to pursue, and to reap the benefits whether they be creative, spiritual, or financial.

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because: I want to do something proactive to help people who face economic disadvantages, and the Kiva philosphy of helping those who are trying to help themselves really appeals to me.
lender.occupational_info: History and Archaeology student.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe these people are asking for a "HAND UP" not a handout and I am fortunate enough to be able to help, even if it's not much. : )

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, we have so much. Traveling around the world has shown me how wonderful other cultures are & I want to do something in my life that will matter. Reaching out with assistance to others matters, & that changes things. BE THE CHANGE!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: helping people become self-sufficient is the great equalizer

lender.name: Dave the Wave
lender.loan_because: others have loaned to me
lender.occupational_info: i care about urban sustainability and creativity

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I have the capabilities to help others, and I see no good reason why I shouldn't.

lender.name: Koelfgen Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe that everyone should have the opportunity to live a successful and fulfilling life.
lender.occupational_info: Creating Advertisements, Protecting National Park Land, Selling and Buying Land and Houses, Taking Naps

lender.name: Leandra
lender.loan_because: I want to "Pay it Forward." We live in a great country and are very lucky to have the opportunities we have. Not everyone in life is so lucky. I hope this will give them a chance for a better life and they will, in turn, continue to "Pay it Forward" for someone else in need.

lender.name: Len
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve lives in the Middle East.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: marketing and communication

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I have seen poverty in third world countries and it breaks my heart. It takes so little to make an impact and change someone's life for the better. I want to be part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people buying or selling their homes.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it's the most effective way to change the world $25 @ a time
lender.occupational_info: If it was easy, more people would be doing it.

lender.name: Reshma
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate and believe I should contribute to the global community
lender.occupational_info: I provide information technology service and support to the U.S. government

lender.name: Molly and Carly
lender.loan_because: it is important to support other entrepreneurs in the world who are less fortunate than we are. we are so lucky here, we should give what we can.
lender.occupational_info: we are students, but we also founded and run a non-profit business of our own dedicated to finding a cure for cancer. Our company raises bees and sells their honey and honey related products. All of our profits go to curing cancer. We know that what it takes to start and sustain a business is sometimes money added to energy and will!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make medical equipment.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping others enrich their own lives. Kiva has made it so easy to turn a small amount of money into great opportunity across the world!

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: Because we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I work one to one with children and youth in foster care.

lender.name: Juan Martitegui
lender.loan_because: I want help people to help themselves

lender.name: Harriet
lender.loan_because: We are all part of one another; I help someone, someone else helps me.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find ways out of domestic violence to lives of safety and peace.

lender.name: Julio Cesar
lender.occupational_info: Working with the sale of computers with basic configuration with the payment deadline extended to people of low income in my city. I fragmentation of the payment in 24 months. Part of the profit from sales is placed in a non-governmental organisation which provides computer classes for the poor in my city.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide an opportunity for those who live in areas of the world where opportunities are limited.
lender.occupational_info: I implement programs within a private company (manufactures chemicals to clean drinking water) to make sure they are compliant with goverment regulations.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world become successful entreprenuers to build their families and communities. I would like to help them have the same opportunities for success that I have had.
lender.occupational_info: In 2006, I opened an online store focusing on artistic needle arts supplies for quilting, knitting, needlepoint and cross stitch. Before that I created my own quilts to sell at art fairs and to local shops.

lender.name: Josh Nankivel
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the engine that drives economic prosperity. Capital is part of the fuel mixture that allows that engine to run. I want to see our global community prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I love to teach people how to get started in project management as a career and improve their skills!

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I think the world is out of whack, and if I can do something to change that, I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in school.

lender.name: Germanican
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who has the will power and ambition but lacks the funds to improve their living standard. It's such a small effort to lend a KIVA loan yet so many lives will be positively impacted by assisting these hard working, brave people. If everyone would just sponsor one person in a less fortunate country, the world would be a much better place!

lender.name: ivonne
lender.loan_because: i want/can do it

lender.name: MaryAnn
lender.loan_because: I want to help women succeed particularly when those women are on their own and responsible for children and other family members.
lender.occupational_info: My work used to be caring for children who were having surgery; now I am retired and helping with the care of my grandaughter.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I feel we are globally connected as human beings. Everyone deserves a good living and a safe place to live. I can help in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at the local zoo as a zoo ambassador, promoting conservation and love of animals to zoo guests. I also volunteer at the Ronald McDonald House which houses families and critically ill children.

lender.name: Dj Das
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of "little drops of water that make up an ocean"
lender.occupational_info: Building new businesses, creating livelihoods, making a difference

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Helping people who want to help themselves generates sustainable improvement in their lives.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Every raindrop raises the sea.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: When I needed help, someone helped me.

lender.name: Tarak & Beena + Anjali
lender.loan_because: I believe that money should be spent where it's best utilized.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student, my wife is a pharmacist.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way of helping other people.

lender.name: Chris and Sally
lender.loan_because: We did not earn the opportunity to turn our hard work into full and prosperous lives. This good fortune was given to us. We want to share some of our good fortune with others who have not been so lucky in where and when they were born.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: everybody can use a hand up every now and then!
lender.occupational_info: I work at an insurance company, using a computer to analyze trends in our business. One of my favorite volunteer activities is helping build houses with Habitat for Humanity - another "hand up" organization!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's the only system like this in the world and it really works. This is how we should all be donating money. To help others help themselves!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am an Actor in Films and Television shows, as well as I do voice-work in Animated series and commercials.

lender.name: Betsey
lender.loan_because: It started as a gift for Christmas from a dear friend, and now it is the base for my resolution to be more involved with charity and giving. I think Kiva allows people to truly engage in helping others while seeing the positive results of their actions. Being able to help others through a relatively small sum of money is a powerful feeling and one I hope to keep going for others.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I help people find housing and work as an administrator in a small minority owned real estate company.

lender.name: Jolynn
lender.loan_because: There's no reason not to. Especially when as little as $25 can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying for my PhD in English: Creative Writing.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I live in such a prosperous country, and I believe in sharing that prosperity with others. Kiva gives us a wonderful opportunity to share a tiny bit in a very big way.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I want to Help people and learn about small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to support a person's effort to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Nurse Midwife who has been very involved in promoting women's health and wellness for most of my life. The fun part was to help women deliver their babies.

lender.name: Solvei
lender.occupational_info: I help kids stay healthy in school.

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: It's cool.
lender.occupational_info: Grounding people financially.

lender.name: Jay
lender.occupational_info: I develop internet web sites.

lender.name: LillyAnn
lender.loan_because:
"The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift." - Albert Einstein
I am here to honor my Gift, and to pay it forward.
Feeling and expressing compassion is just not enough. I believe in helping people help themselves. We all need a little help now and then and for very few dollars I can help make a big difference in someone life. It's time to close the door of hate and open the door of love all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a personal growth expert, MS, MA, P.h.D., a relationship, marriage and family therapist, motivational and inspirational speaker, intuitive clairvoyant counselor, and author. I help people from all walks of life develop strategies to attract, grow, and retain meaningful and long lasting relationships.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I love to see people helpping themself and not looking to others for support

lender.name: Kathy & Barry
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for Christmas from my parents. I am looking forward to using this gift. This program sounds like a wonderful opportunity for everyone involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a school district. I assist the Superintendent with day to day operations.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Want to give deserving people and enterprises my support

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a wonderful country like Canada, and I want to share to make someone else's life easier.
lender.occupational_info: Working with people who have substance abuse problems

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help people in a direct way, even if there is a great distance between where you live.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Australian Government, and would describe my work to someone across the world as, better than it once was.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people get a steady income to provide for their family.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I had a gift
lender.occupational_info: Manage People and computers

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: Each small act can have great ramifications.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I loan to people in Ukraine because my church has a partner church there and I want to see the Ukrainian people remain free and have the opportunity to have easier lives. I loan to Paraguayans because I spent a summer there as a teenager, and we have a family friend who is Paraguayan.

lender.name: The G Family
lender.loan_because: We don't need Big Government; we just need people to live the faith they profess. All Christians are called to help their neighbors. And who is my neighbor? Luke 10:29-37

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am able to do so. Many people have no idea how lucky we are. If we can't help a others enjoy a fraction of what we take for granted, then why are we here?

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Compassion and empathy is what make us human.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I can. I don't make much money myself (by the local standards my income is nearer to the poverty line than the mean income) but on the other hand, the needs of the businesses that are funded are not big either.
lender.occupational_info: Statistical data analyses: I look at data related to the functioning of the educational system in Finland - the primary objective of this work is to find out whether people living in different parts of the country have similar educational opportunities.

lender.name: ODGFurniture, Inc
lender.loan_because: We believe in giving back and in an equitable distribution of resources for all.
lender.occupational_info: We make furniture.

lender.name: MaryJane
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to help people help themselves. I love this idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of helping people find a great place to work. I love people and I love helping them.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy for me, and is doing such wonderful work.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I hope that our world can be peaceful and successful
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is something that makes a true impact.
lender.occupational_info: I teacher middle school music.

lender.name: Donald
lender.occupational_info: Business process and technology consulting.

lender.name: Ann & Steve
lender.loan_because: It'a a good thing to do, and everybody needs help one time or another.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and help people the same way people have helped me throughout the years.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur just like you. Visit my website to learn more about what my work involves.

lender.name: Robert and Barb
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is a special privilege to be able to tell someone whom we may never meet, you matter and your work is valuable.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who recently earned her Ed.D after completing and successfully defending a dissertation focused on school bullying. My husband is a programmer who loves working on and riding his Harley motorcycle with his free time. We are both passionate about our little West Highland White Terrier : )

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my 9 year old daughter the importance of kindness and that we can make a positive change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an university, not on campus, but in a rural county. We work to improve the quality of life for people in WV through education and research based programs.

lender.name: Britteny
lender.loan_because: I need to do more than just academic work in these countries.
lender.occupational_info: I study the people and cultures of the world in order to increase the knowledge, sensitivity, and tolerance of the rest of it.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: It has been amazing to see how a simple loan can help so many people. I
lender.occupational_info: Construction

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: We want to set an example for our son. Sharing and loving isn't just for the playroom...everything is global now!
lender.occupational_info: Split our time between work and home with our son Abraham.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I believe in the basic goodness of all people.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: Better living in one part of the world equals better living everywhere. Welcome to globalisation.
lender.occupational_info: I point my camera at things I deem interesting and process the result into something that might interest other people.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: Lending small amounts of money directly to people with a need for a business loan seems to me the best way ever to donate. Thank you Kiva for putting those who can together with those that need...
lender.occupational_info: I currently work with my daughter who has opened her own small business. She has a take out food shop, mostly sandwiches. I don't take a pay yet. I hope to when someday when the shop is doing good enough for me to do so.

lender.name: Bettie
lender.loan_because: helps women out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: i help people save time, money and worry with their finances and i teach others how to do the same

lender.name: Cameron & Pamela
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate to live in a Country where we have so much, and I believe with all of us helping together to give others the chance to make a better life for themself ,and their families we can make the world a much better place for all of us. "What happens to one of us Happens to us all"
lender.occupational_info: My Husband works for Campbell Crane as a Crane Operator & I work in a Hospital Business office as an account Representative

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: My boss was generous and gave me a kiva certificate.

lender.name: Timothy Ross , FA
lender.loan_because: It is better to teach someone how to fish, then to just give them a fish to eat. By being in business you can take care of yourself vs getting a hand out. By loaning we can have a greater impact in a persons life so they can get the tools to get their business going , bigger, and better. This should result in a higher standard of living for the borrower. Micro banks help this happen. It is a good social investment.
lender.occupational_info:
Helping Familes Achieve Life's Major Goals
www.timothyross.com

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help sometime. It is amazing what people can accomplish with a small loan and a lot of faith in themselves. I am happy to be in a position to help and "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I run the office of a county medical society. Our members are local doctors who work together to improve health care for everyone in California and the United States.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to invest in women who are working to realize their goals, support their families, and improve their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of philanthropy for a private foundation. Instead of making loans to individuals, the foundation makes grants to local nonprofit organizations that work to improve the lives of people living in the Greater Washington area.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world any way i can.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I can help someone I choose
lender.occupational_info: I find corporations who pay to sponsor an event or activity performed by my clients.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I love to see people in need get a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I taught school for 22 yrs. and was in education for 30 yrs. I love people and helping them better their lives. I have been blessed and want to see others blessed also.

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Piper
lender.loan_because: What I consider to be a small amount of money can make a huge impact on the lives of a person, family and community. It is an opportunity to help someone create a sustainable living for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company who provides historical tours, attractions and retail shops in Key West, St. Augustine, Savannah, Washington, D.C., Boston and San Diego.

lender.name: Paul & Jodi
lender.loan_because: We can, we all can afford to give something.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: Being able to help someone reach thier dreams and goals is a beautiful thing.
lender.occupational_info: Help my husband run his business. Pay bills, take care of banking, purchase office supplies, etc.

lender.name: diokno
lender.loan_because: I believe that I can achieve my goals in making my life more productive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a divorce for almost 10 years, for almost all those years i was preoccupied in taking care of not only with my three children also my father and mother with a salary for baby setting babies of my neighbors. I am hoping that if i can have a more resource to my Macrami bags i could extend it to support myself, since my three children are already married.

lender.name: Karnig
lender.loan_because: altruism lives!

lender.name: Kira
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have been born into a family with the means to support, encourage, and teach me to become a generous and independent woman. It is now my responsibility as a citizen of this planet to be generous, encouraging, and help as many people as possible achieve independence in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school special education teacher in Southern California.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference and helping people out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Senior in High School.

lender.name: Nejat
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in another person's life. I have been fortunate to recieve help from others and want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their legal problems.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: want to make a positive impact on someone's life

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people make a difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: We help people, from first time buyers thru to retirement with the biggest purchase/sale of their lives.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Xanthi
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a developed nation whereas many billions were not. I have worked as a Kiva Fellow and have seen firsthand the difference Kiva makes. Plus it makes me feel good!

lender.name: John and Dawn
lender.loan_because: Our life has been blessed and we want to help others achieve their goals. God's great commission is to love other people and this is one way we do that!
lender.occupational_info: I make devices that go in peoples bodies to make them well.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: it is important to try and help others, create opportunity where there is spirit to try thing for oneself.
lender.occupational_info: Scott R. Dinin Esq. MBA. Full Service Advisory Firm lead expertise covers High Profile Clients, Public Corporations and Brands. We have provided Special Counsel Services for clients in a variety of industries, both nationally and internationally

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: While traveling around the world last year, I was astounded by the entrepreneurial spirit I encountered again and again. Being able to help someone realize their own vision and dream simply brings a smile to my face.
lender.occupational_info: In a nut shell.... As a Human Resource Director, I partner with the business units within my organization to help them achieve their business objectives with a focus towards the people.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: Helping others, helps us. If you want to help, you can!

lender.name: hee jong
lender.loan_because: i want help othet people
lender.occupational_info: i'm just student ^^ now i;m just finished master of degree of ecomomics. i'm study specially economic integrtion.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I want to give back the blessings our family has received to those who are willing to work hard for their futures!

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I love people.

lender.name: Lorena
lender.loan_because: we all need to help each other along.

lender.name: Kathie & Dave
lender.loan_because: We are pleased to be able to help another person achieve their goals and really appreciate seeing the results.
lender.occupational_info: Our previous work was in the computer industry, Dave managing software development teams while Kathie did consulting work in the same field.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money in my life can have a huge positive impact on someone else's in another part of the world, and ultimately we're all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I work for our church, with students from 7th-12th grades. I get to help them grow in their faith, in themselves and in God. It's an amazing gift and responsibility!

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: A recent trip to Africa made me realize how much help people in developing nations need.
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop drugs to treat illnesses such as diabetes and hepatitis.

lender.name: Laura and Michael
lender.loan_because:
We're in a position to give a little help to others. It's important to know we are all connected to each other. It's fun to see the real people behind the loans..it makes it feel personal and real.
I grew up with parents who are self employed and I know how great and how hard that can be. I especially want to help creative people build their visions and make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary school in the computer lab. I teach about whatever they are learning in their classroom, but I find cool interactive websites and games that make learning come alive.

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: It is my job to find the cast (actors) for tv shows and movies.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: there seem to be millions of people on this planet that can use my money more than I. Also, because banks don't pay squat for interest - it isn't like I lose out on much - unless the loan isn't repaid - but then at least the money went to a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I work at least forty hours a week writing code on a computer.... hmm... let me rephrase that - I work at a company with some phenomenally talented people.
